name: Tuğçe Nur Pekçetin
title: Cognitive Science Ph.D Postdoctoral Fulbright Scholar
bio: I'm Tuğçe Pekçetin, a Cognitive Science Ph.D. and a Fulbright Postdoctoral Scholar (2025–2026). I study how people collaborate with robots and intelligent systems, focusing on trust, mind/action perception, and transparent interfaces.
